remarks: Value of the recursive definition generator at a successor. This can be thought of as a generalization of ~ oasuc and ~ omsuc . (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 29-Aug-2019.)
statement:
rdgisuc1.1 $e |- ( ph -> F Fn _V ) $.
rdgisuc1.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
rdgisuc1.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. On ) $.
rdgisucinc.inc $e |- ( ph -> A. x x C_ ( F ` x ) ) $.
rdgisucinc $p |- ( ph -> ( rec ( F , A ) ` suc B ) = ( F ` ( rec ( F , A ) ` B ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
$d V x $.
